name: Delonix software solutions
description:
DELONIX has become a leading name in the field of web, software, and mobile development in a short period. The company is backed with a team of highly experienced and talented people, handling successfully a variety of simple and complex projects. We are quite confident to offer the best possible solutions to cater clients and firms internationally.
Our expertise lies in Microsoft .Net Software Application, Open Source Web Application, Mobile Applications (iPhone, iPad, Android), Facebook apps on Framework development platforms. Our approach remains the same whether you want to develop a mobile application or a website. 100% customer satisfaction is our motto. We not only satisfy our clients but believe in long standing relationship. At DELONIX, we are filled with cutting edge technologies clubbed with ultra-modern infrastructure assuring sure shot results. Our proactive team of tech-hungry employees is in sync with the latest trends in software, mobile and web development making us well equipped for the future.
